name: A Scarecrow's Life Demo
description:
A Scarecrow's Life is an early prototype for development, research and educational purposes and is intended to demonstrate the core gameplay elements.

If possible, please take some time to fill in the following gameplay experience survey:

https://forms.gle/WvLJgv1w1VYqh8xVA

Your feedback is very much appreciated.

CONTROLS:

Start game = Space 

movement = Arrow Keys

Space = Jump (hit space again while in mid air to double jump)

Shift = attack

Z =  Block

X = Interact

R = Reset
